name: The Unfathomable
description:
Rougelite game where you must dive as deep as you can, avoiding or blasting deep sea creatures with your laser beams!

Your bathysphere will be able to salvage wrecks from your previous attempts, so each failure will you an upper hand on all your next runs.

This game was made as part of Ludum Dare 48.

Controls:

Bathysphere will follow the mouse. If the mouse is above the bathysphere, it will descent slower, and the further the mouse is below the bathysphere, the faster it will go.

Laser beams are automatic.
